meanings.definition: The track or scent left by a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: We followed the spoor of the deer through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The hunter found the spoor of the bear near the river.
meanings.sent3: The detective carefully examined the spoor left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: The spoor of the lost dog led us to the park.
meanings.sent5: The spoor of the rabbit was faint but still visible on the path.

meanings.sent1: The wildlife expert decided to spoor the tiger in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: We spoor the wolves to study their migration patterns.
meanings.sent3: I will spoor the cat to see where it goes every night.

meanings.sent5: The researchers spoor the elephants to observe their behavior.
